page.title: 12Today's News. 1
page.content: Extracts from the local news paper. {Parking Lots}Two car parking spaces have been reserved and marked for disabled people at the end of Train Lane,Pickering. {Poster Prize}Winners of competition being run at Pickering Junior School, to paint a poster depicting the message"Don't talk to strangers",will be given a ride in a police road traffic car as their reward. {Mandy is Carnival Queen}Mandy Atkinson aged 15,of Wrelton,has been chosen as Pickering Carnival Queen.She will be crowned on July 15th;when her attendants will be Sharron Walker,of Pickering and Sandra Kendell of Thornton Dale. {Christian Aid}Â£1222 was raised in collections for Christian Aid.
